sentence: Everyone was actually quite wonderful but the lack of knowledge about simple maintenance issues is inexcusable especially as we did not discover the tub issue until we had unpacked and were preparing for bed
The only explanation we got was that that part of the hotel was due for renovation
Definitely in need of some major refurbishing in the rooms and hallways or at least some good carpet cleaning
I was not aware the hotel is under construction renovation when I booked
Bottom line for the price until they are finished renovating I would consider staying elsewhere
But with all the other maintenance problems it makes me worry why it is discolored
It used to be a place that enjoyed spending weeks on end and I am very sorry that they have decided to go this route with their renovations
